instruction: Connect the 'Data Preprocessing' block to both 'Feature Engineering' and 'Model Selection', and connect 'Feature Engineering' to 'Model Training'.
input_xml: <mxGraphModel><root><mxCell id="0"/><mxCell id="1" parent="0"/><mxCell id="data_collection" value="Data Collection" style="rectangle;fillColor=#DAE8FC;" vertex="1" parent="1"><mxGeometry x="60" y="50" width="140" height="50" as="geometry"/></mxCell><mxCell id="preprocessing" value="Data Preprocessing" style="rectangle;fillColor=#DAE8FC;" vertex="1" parent="1"><mxGeometry x="240" y="50" width="160" height="50" as="geometry"/></mxCell><mxCell id="feature" value="Feature Engineering" style="rectangle;fillColor=#E1D5E7;" vertex="1" parent="1"><mxGeometry x="440" y="20" width="160" height="50" as="geometry"/></mxCell><mxCell id="selection" value="Model Selection" style="rectangle;fillColor=#D5E8D4;" vertex="1" parent="1"><mxGeometry x="440" y="100" width="160" height="50" as="geometry"/></mxCell><mxCell id="training" value="Model Training" style="rectangle;fillColor=#FFF2CC;" vertex="1" parent="1"><mxGeometry x="640" y="60" width="160" height="50" as="geometry"/></mxCell><mxCell id="e0" edge="1" source="data_collection" target="preprocessing" style="endArrow=block" parent="1"><mxGeometry relative="1" as="geometry"/></mxCell></root></mxGraphModel>
output_xml: <mxGraphModel><root><mxCell id="0"/><mxCell id="1" parent="0"/><mxCell id="data_collection" value="Data Collection" style="rectangle;fillColor=#DAE8FC;" vertex="1" parent="1"><mxGeometry x="60" y="50" width="140" height="50" as="geometry"/></mxCell><mxCell id="preprocessing" value="Data Preprocessing" style="rectangle;fillColor=#DAE8FC;" vertex="1" parent="1"><mxGeometry x="240" y="50" width="160" height="50" as="geometry"/></mxCell><mxCell id="feature" value="Feature Engineering" style="rectangle;fillColor=#E1D5E7;" vertex="1" parent="1"><mxGeometry x="440" y="20" width="160" height="50" as="geometry"/></mxCell><mxCell id="selection" value="Model Selection" style="rectangle;fillColor=#D5E8D4;" vertex="1" parent="1"><mxGeometry x="440" y="100" width="160" height="50" as="geometry"/></mxCell><mxCell id="training" value="Model Training" style="rectangle;fillColor=#FFF2CC;" vertex="1" parent="1"><mxGeometry x="640" y="60" width="160" height="50" as="geometry"/></mxCell><mxCell id="e0" edge="1" source="data_collection" target="preprocessing" style="endArrow=block" parent="1"><mxGeometry relative="1" as="geometry"/></mxCell><mxCell id="e1" edge="1" source="preprocessing" target="feature" style="endArrow=block" parent="1"><mxGeometry relative="1" as="geometry"/></mxCell><mxCell id="e2" edge="1" source="preprocessing" target="selection" style="endArrow=block" parent="1"><mxGeometry relative="1" as="geometry"/></mxCell><mxCell id="e3" edge="1" source="feature" target="training" style="endArrow=block" parent="1"><mxGeometry relative="1" as="geometry"/></mxCell></root></mxGraphModel>

instruction: Add arrows from 'Decision' to both 'Approve' and 'Reject'.
input_xml: <mxGraphModel><root><mxCell id="0"/><mxCell id="1" parent="0"/><mxCell id="start" value="Start" style="ellipse" vertex="1" parent="1"><mxGeometry x="60" y="40" width="100" height="40" as="geometry"/></mxCell><mxCell id="decision" value="Decision" style="rhombus" vertex="1" parent="1"><mxGeometry x="200" y="40" width="100" height="60" as="geometry"/></mxCell><mxCell id="approve" value="Approve" style="rectangle" vertex="1" parent="1"><mxGeometry x="340" y="10" width="100" height="40" as="geometry"/></mxCell><mxCell id="reject" value="Reject" style="rectangle" vertex="1" parent="1"><mxGeometry x="340" y="90" width="100" height="40" as="geometry"/></mxCell><mxCell id="e0" edge="1" source="start" target="decision" style="endArrow=block;" parent="1"><mxGeometry relative="1" as="geometry"/></mxCell></root></mxGraphModel>
output_xml: <mxGraphModel><root><mxCell id="0"/><mxCell id="1" parent="0"/><mxCell id="start" value="Start" style="ellipse" vertex="1" parent="1"><mxGeometry x="60" y="40" width="100" height="40" as="geometry"/></mxCell><mxCell id="decision" value="Decision" style="rhombus" vertex="1" parent="1"><mxGeometry x="200" y="40" width="100" height="60" as="geometry"/></mxCell><mxCell id="approve" value="Approve" style="rectangle" vertex="1" parent="1"><mxGeometry x="340" y="10" width="100" height="40" as="geometry"/></mxCell><mxCell id="reject" value="Reject" style="rectangle" vertex="1" parent="1"><mxGeometry x="340" y="90" width="100" height="40" as="geometry"/></mxCell><mxCell id="e0" edge="1" source="start" target="decision" style="endArrow=block;" parent="1"><mxGeometry relative="1" as="geometry"/></mxCell><mxCell id="e1" edge="1" source="decision" target="approve" style="endArrow=block;" parent="1"><mxGeometry relative="1" as="geometry"/></mxCell><mxCell id="e2" edge="1" source="decision" target="reject" style="endArrow=block;" parent="1"><mxGeometry relative="1" as="geometry"/></mxCell></root></mxGraphModel>
